channel.description:
Due to past discrepancies with this user I suggest anyone who has run it to run a virus scan, this user has been known to post malicious content in the past.
- Ruby

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I have enough proof to be sure this is actually this “Keith” person, the advertisement has now been removed and he’s been banned again. If someone has any idea of the account he comes back under (like the several others he’s done as I can see from his IPs) feel free to PM me and I’ll take care of that too.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Jauro wrote:

[quote=“JUMPHIM, post:35, topic:521115”]its funny how people bitch about Keith, saying hes in it for the money. the last time he launched the server it
was up for a whole year without taking any donations.

also Dustin has always been like that just give him the loveing mod how much damage can he possibly do.[/quote]

Keith’s servers had some good pking, but that was long long time ago, i dont really even know why he has released the last replicas of his server, turning a pk server into skilling made player base drop baaaad. Last time it got opened, they just did it to get Emu players info, so they could steal their banks and sell for $ and its a fact. lol.

item.dc:creator: @Pyru Pyru
item.description:
@Pyru wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:32, topic:521115”][quote author=Pyru link=topic=639616.msg4312514#msg4312514 date=1370971524]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=639616.msg4312513#msg4312513 date=1370971299]

Stay on topic, no need for false accusations. Dustin, whom above is mad because I wouldn’t give him mod out of the 1000 times he has asked. Sorry.

Come join.

Actually im mad i gave you 50 bucks for stuff that you never followed through with. Just like pyru.

Dustin,

Just as stated, you beg for moderator on EVERY server that opens up and if you don’t get it, you are sour towards the owner / admin. I followed through with your donation, you broke the rules and got banned, then charged back. Stop falsifying information.

OT: Yes, The Djinn is Keith. Just a heads up, you initially forgot to whoisguard your domain, and Keith Munoz was the registered name.
[/quote]Why would you tell him that rather than telling staff members, like I did? Retard…

Why does it matter, secret agent man? By the time a moderator actually reviews your message and takes action, battle-x will most likely be shutdown.
[/quote]Because he’ll know to do it in the future… Do you honestly think this will be the last time he tries to host a server?

BTW what happened to not being active and not caring about anything on Mopar?[/quote]

Do I need to state it again, or did you miss it the first time? Because I post a few times here or there, doesn’t make me “active”. I still don’t care for Mopar, but that is besides the point here. As I previously said, you probably contacted a staff member regarding Keith advertising a week ago and still nothing has been done, these boards are rarely moderated.

Don’t worry secret agent CodeForFame, if it isn’t the last server he launches, you’ll have much more work ahead of you!

Read full topic

Yea well, like many else…

I would like to know in what capacity Keith is banned, because I can’t remember anything that is malicious from his previous servers other than Joe(you, if I have my information correctly) and Lefty put a keylogger in his client downloader/updater, so basically these two guys got him banned then…

I don’t know if this is the truth, I don’t accuse anyone for anything, if im wrong, then please fill me in. I really would like to know how this was done. Keith was accused thats for sure.[/quote]Go look at past threads… Also, your information isn’t even remotely correct; the only “evidence” that I’m “Joe” is purely Keith spewing lies, but like the reasoning Keith was banned from adverting, you can just use the search function to get your facts straight.
